TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLink extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 會將連結顯示至另一個網頁的控制項。

span.span: A control that displays a link to another Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來建立另一個網頁的連結。Use the control to create a link to another Web page. 控制項通常會顯示為所指定的文字屬性。The control is typically displayed as text specified by the property. 它也可以顯示為所指定影像屬性。It can also be displayed as an image specified by the property. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字屬性會顯示。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器屬性也會成為工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立控制在網頁上連結至另一個網頁。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page that links to another Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓文字會以粗體字顯示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text is displayed in a bold font. [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorender.vb#2)] 下列 Web Form 會使用自訂伺服器控制項來顯示超連結以粗體顯示的字型。The following Web Form uses the custom server control to display a hyperlink with a bold font. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_hyperlink_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that represents the parsed element.

summary.span: 通知控制項有項目已被解析，並將項目加入至 控制項。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed, and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，這個方法主要由控制項開發人員，使用類別。This method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the class. 輸入的物件是否，而控制項沒有任何子控制項，然後輸入的物件用來設定控制項的屬性。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, then the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否則，請方法的基底類別稱為和指定的物件加入至集合。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在自訂伺服器控制項，讓它一律會剖析的物件的 text 屬性，設定文字屬性的已剖析的物件是否，並為空字串否則為。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHyperLinkAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_hyperlink_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 控制項的影像的路徑。

value.span: 顯示於 控制項之影像的路徑。

span.span: The path to the image to display for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以顯示為文字或影像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用屬性來指定要顯示之影像控制項。Use the property to specify an image to display for the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字屬性會顯示。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器屬性也會成為工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性來指定要顯示之影像的路徑。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the path to the image to display. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.NavigateUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsDisabledAttribute : bool

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在按一下 控制項時顯示所連結之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 目標視窗或框架，載入當按一下 控制項時所連結的 Web 網頁。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 除了下列以底線為開頭的特殊值以外，該值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭：

span.span: Values must begin with a letter in the range of a through z (case-insensitive), except for the special values listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore.

item.description: 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。
呈現直接框架組父項中的內容。
轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。
呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。
呈現完整的視窗，在無框架的內容。

block.para: 請檢查您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷支援值。例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更新版本都支援目標值。

item.description: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
Renders the content in the search pane.
Renders the content in the frame with focus.
Renders the content in the full window without frames.

block.para: Check your browser documentation to determine if the value is supported. For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the target value.

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁的連結時按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when the control is clicked. 設定來指定網頁屬性。The Web page is specified by setting the property. 如果未設定這個屬性，瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗會重新整理時按一下控制項時。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性上`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出，如必須與 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)並[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示與相關聯的頁面控制項。The following example demonstrates how to set the property to specify the window or frame to display the page associated with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的文字標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption for the control.
The text caption for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以顯示為文字或影像。The control can be displayed as text or an image. 使用屬性來指定要顯示的文字控制項。Use the property to specify the text to display for the control. 如果兩個並設定的屬性，屬性會優先。If both the and properties are set, the property takes precedence. 如果無法使用，將映像中的文字屬性會顯示。If the image is unavailable, the text in the property is displayed. 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器屬性也會成為工具提示。In browsers that support ToolTip functionality, the property also becomes the ToolTip. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 驗證伺服器控制項語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的文字控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text to display for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HyperLink.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HyperLink.Text Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
